description:
After years of making some of the most popular mountain biking pedals in the game, Crank Brothers is taking the connection between bike and rider one step further. Equipped with the excellent BOA fit system, this version of the Mallet Enduro line lets you spend less time fiddling with laces and more time riding. A stiff shank and optimized cleat box offer excellent power transfer in the ups and the downs, and a confident connection when things get techie, or airborne.

  • BOA® dial fit system and strap for dialing in the perfect fit
  • Internal grip in the heel cup help keep your foot anchored in place
  • Ventilated uppers and a perforated tongue let your feet breathe
  • TPU overlay protects from pedal spikes
  • Match cleat box clears mud with ease and has a ramped entry and exit for smooth attachment
  • Works with SPDs and Crank Brothers cleats
  • Stiff shank for maximized power transfer
  • MC1 rubber outsole balances reduced friction for easy clipping out, with a solid on pedal connection
  • Match outsole has a ramped toe and aggressive lugs for comfortable walking and traction while hike-a-biking
name: Crankbrothers Mallet E Boa Cycling Shoes - Unisex
